product_name: BRU Green Label, 500g Poly Pack: Amazon.in: Amazon Pantry

reviews.review_title: Too much Chicory! Hence low price... It's not a worth a shot
reviews.review_body: It's bitter, people who adds less sugar would find difficult to drink due to higher chicory.Packet is huge, my mom was waiting when it will get over.Look for something else.

Genuine ReviewNov-2018HydI have been using this product from past 5 years. It is good overall.We have make it as filter coffee.Got 500gm for Rs.115/- on Diwali sale. Price normally vary from Rs.115/- / Rs.132/- and Rs.150/- on regular days in Amazon.All together it is good. Iam giving 4 stars.
Wonderful and remember my old days of having filtered coffee. Didn't have it yet. Will update all

Green label coffee is one of the best coffee usually I had everyday.This is a virginal test of a coffee and useful to have the coffee everyday.I agree with the other brand Hi5 coffee that can  taste awesome occasionally but for day-to-day coffee taste to feel green label is one of the best.

Every month I useTHIS, this time  quality not good, mixing of checory and coffee maybe falut? Reverse of mixing checory More and coffee less possible to replace me, Smell also bad smell 0.500 kgs wast, I loss rs.150 I like Green Label not future this issue solve satisfy to me replace my 0.500kgs. and composition of another 0.500 kgs.

reviews.review_title: The different strenghts of Bru Coffee
reviews.review_body: I like the flavor of Bru coffee with the influence of chicory. It beats all the other coffees I have drunk. I also like the fact that you can get different strengths with the instant coffee and different chicory percentage in the grounds.

I was using Nescafe instant coffee for a long time,but read an article somewhere which suggested that filter coffee is much healthier than instant coffee so I went for this Bru Green label coffee powder.If prepared properly this coffee tastes exactly like instant coffee.I usually drink it black but addition of milk makes it much tastier.
Good product.Taste is same like South Indian filter coffee.For trial purpose this product should available in 250gms.packet instead 500gms.Good combination of chicory for the bitter taste.
